name: angular-radial-color-picker
description: Angular-ready radial color picker with some sleek animations.

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist/js && mkdirp dist/css
scripts.scss: mkdirp dist/css && npm run scss:src && npm run scss:dist
scripts.minify: npm run annotate && uglifyjs dist/js/color-picker.js -o dist/js/color-picker.min.js --source-map dist/js/color-picker.min.js.map --source-map-root / --source-map-url color-picker.min.js.map --source-map-include-sources -c -m
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify && npm run scss && npm run images

author: Zlati Pehlivanov <Zlati.Pehlivanov@mentormate.com>
